content.text: Cameron Diaz was born in San Diego, California and grew up in Long Beach, California.

content.text: If that wasn't enough, when Obama fever swept the globe in 2008, Diaz really came out of her shell, making her first and only political donation of a whopping $26,200 to Obama's campaign.
